alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:06AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 5000 feet, total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches expected. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 4000 feet, total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph will cause blowing snow, resulting in visibility reductions. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
